Maturita project: Marketing campaign for my high school

Putting all I have so far learnt into the project.

I decided to do something useful for my maturita project, which was part of my final maturita examination from Information technology. I created a complete campaign for my high school focused on future students explaining them reasons why to join Gymnázium J. K. Tyla v Hradci Králové.

View Project

Internship in Brusel

Being able to see how the EU laws are made from the first hand.

I was given a great opportunity to be a two week intern for Czech member of European parliament, Jiří Pospíšil, in Brusel.

View Project

Codename: Project USA

I had a dream. I made it happen.

I had a dream to come back to the US to see my friends graduate. I also wanted to promote being exchange student in the US among Czech students. I created a proposal, found a partner and traveled to the US to shoot videos about life across the ocean.

View Project

Marketing and business development at ProSpolužáky.cz

Being a part of an awesome startup again.

After coming from the US, I was full of energy and I wanted to find a purposeful project where I could invest my energy to. When the opportunity to join ProSpolužáky.cz appeared, I jumped right on the boat.

View Project

Writing Math textbooks at ProSpolužáky.cz

Simply great experience with great people.

At the age of 16, I found out about the project from Marek Liška, who set himself a goal to come up with student friendly Math textbooks. He came to one of our Math classes and offered us to join his team. I did not hesitate and joined him.
